name.en: Application of Animal and Non-Animal Testing Technologies in Regenerative Medicine
name.ch: 動物及非動物檢測技術應用於再生醫療

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 本課程是國立中央大學生醫科學與工程學系與財團法人國家衛生研究院生醫工程與奈米醫學研究所共同開設課程，旨在探討生物晶片及醫學影像技術在動物和非動物檢測領域的應用的課程。通過這堂課，學生可以瞭解到生物晶片原理及應用，以及醫學影像技術，例如：X-ray、Ultrasound、MRI、PET、CT/μ-CT、IVIS等，各種影像系統在動物疾病診斷、治療以及研究中的重要角色；同時，這門課也會涵蓋生物晶片及醫學影像技術在非動物替代（NAMs）方面的應用。藉由實例分析和實地參訪，學生能夠掌握生物晶片及醫學影像技術的基本知識和技能，並能夠理解其在不同領域的實際應用和重要性。(所有授課地點在國立中央大學)
goal.en: This course is jointly offered by the Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering at National Central University and the Institute of Biomedical Engineering and Nanomedicine at the National Health Research Institutes. It aims to explore the applications of biochips and medical imaging technology in the fields of animal and non-animal testing. Through this course, students will gain an understanding of the principles and applications of biochips, as well as medical imaging technologies such as X-ray, Ultrasound, MRI, PET, CT/μ-CT, and IVIS. These imaging systems play a crucial role in the diagnosis, treatment, and research of animal diseases. Additionally, the course will cover the applications of biochips and medical imaging technology in the field of non-animal alternatives (NAMs). Through case studies and field visits, students will be able to grasp the fundamental knowledge and skills of biochips and medical imaging technology, and understand their practical applications and significance in various fields. (All courses will be conducted in-person at National Central University.)
